title: Principal Engineer, Software Engineering – Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (US Remote)
description:
Join us as a Principal AI/ML Engineer on our APEX AI Engineering team in the US (Remote) to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.

The computing industry is going through a generational transformation fueled by the cloud operating model. As organizations accelerate their digital transformation, they have increasingly started to rely on the power of the cloud operating model to innovate more and achieve their business results faster. With project APEX Dell Technologies is on a journey of its own to fundamentally modernize how customers engage with us across the entire span of their journey. We are reinventing everything from how our customers discover, purchase, provision, manage, operate, and expand every one of our offers – from infrastructure to consumer to the services portfolio. While we are doing this, we are on a path to redefine how the world looks at hybrid cloud computing itself.

Project APEX is defining the future of Dell Technologies and the APEX Console is the central pane of glass for delivering all as-a-Service offers to our customers. It’s a singular orchestration platform across the company for our customers to engage with Dell Technologies.

The APEX AI Engineering teams’ mission is to build machine learning and analytics capabilities into the APEX ecosystem to streamline end-to-end operations. We are looking for a senior data scientist to help lead our AI/ML and predictive analytics capabilities.

If you want to join the ‘ground-floor’ of a massive transformational effort and feel excited by the opportunity to lead a generational transformation for ourselves, and our customers – this role may be just the right opportunity for you!

Responsibilities:
• Lead the design of AI/ML systems to resolve practical problems in hybrid cloud environments with cross functional team members’, including software engineers, Data Scientists, DevOps, business analysists to apply various techniques and theories from statistics, machine learning, and business intelligence.
• Design and architecture of high quality, complex CI/CD pipeline for ML model development.
• Leads and performs end-to-end engineering tasks involved in model development, while establishing subject-matter expertise in key horizontal or vertical themes.
• Develop innovative solutions by executing preliminary data exploration, training data preparation, proof of concept on model design, as well as model evaluation, validation,and performance profiling.
• Generates new product requirements for the engineering group to enhance the analytics capabilities of the big data platform, in alignment with emerging subject-matter expertise.

Essential Requirements
• 8+ years or 6+ years with a master’s degree; or 3+ years with a PhD; or equivalent experience in statistics, mathematics, physics, computer science or a related quantitative field.
• Rich experience with various AI / ML modeling techniques & algorithms for solving different kinds of problems, e.g., Clustering, Regularization, Bayesian inference, Decision Tree, Deep Learning, etc.
• Experiences in the design of application program interfaces (APIs) for applying AI / ML models in cloud or hybrid environments
• Experience with Machine Learning pipeline &, monitoring related tools, and resolving potential issues during model training and production deployment. Examples include (but not limited to) Kubeflow, TensorFlow Extended, Azure MLOps, etc.
• Strong software development experience in languages such as Python, Java, Scala, C++ and demonstrated experience with Agile development methodologies.

Nice to have
• Experiences in research and implement MLOps tools, frameworks, and platforms for Data Science projects.
• Experience with databases, SQL / NoSQL, Knowledge base, Graph model technologies.
• Experience with big data analytics technology such as Hadoop, Spark, and related modules preferable.

Here’s our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.
